name: French in a Flash: Simple Carrot Salad with Mustard and Walnuts
description: This simple salad made from finely shredded carrots, punchy mustard, and walnuts is healthy, light, and perfect for summer.
totalTime: 5 minutes, plus 2 hours to overnight marinating in the fridge

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, whisk together mustard, walnut oil, olive oil, cider vinegar, salt, and pepper until emulsified. Toss the carrots with the sauce, and top with chopped walnuts. Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate for at least two hours before serving.
